category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 19 (Results of Deliberation)
contents: Article 19 (Results of deliberation) ① The committee must establish objective deliberation standards and conduct fair evaluation. ② The committee deliberates and decides autonomously and independently based on the evaluation of the deliberation standards in Paragraph 1. ③ The deliberation standards under paragraph 1 shall be determined by the committee. ④ If the committee decides on executive deliberation, the Sports Council must notify the person who requested executive deliberation of the deliberation results.
